overview: Blake brings significant real estate expertise to the Fisher Capital team. Prior to joining the family business in 1996, Blake worked as Vice President at United Artists Realty Company and TCI Realty Company, where he was responsible for acquisition and disposition of properties, asset management, and property management of a large real estate portfolio. He holds an accounting degree from the University of Wyoming. In addition to spending time with his wife and two daughters, Blake enjoys golfing, fishing, hunting, snowmobiling, snowboarding and coaching his daughtersâ€™ soccer teams.
